items.content_html: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.
items.title: thinakaranmanokaran/Package-Helper: A lightweight Node.js package published on NPM to simplify and automate common development tasks, designed for quick integration and ease of use.

items.content_html: Finance Tracker is a lightweight, client-side financial tracking application designed to help users manage and analyze personal expenses. It features interactive data visualizations, intuitive UI, and real-time insights into income and spending patterns.
items.title: Pritam7620/finance-tracker: Finance Tracker is a lightweight, client-side financial tracking application designed to help users manage and analyze personal expenses. It features interactive data visualizations, intuitive UI, and real-time insights into income and spending patterns.

items.content_html: csv-refine is a lightweight Node.js utility for processing and refining CSV files. It provides features such as date format correction, argument parsing, and customizable options for sorting and transforming CSV data.
items.title: chernjie/csv-refine: csv-refine is a lightweight Node.js utility for processing and refining CSV files. It provides features such as date format correction, argument parsing, and customizable options for sorting and transforming CSV data.

items.content_html: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.
items.title: inversify/monorepo: A powerful and lightweight inversion of control container for JavaScript & Node.js apps powered by TypeScript.

items.content_html: A lightweight and easy-to-use rich text editor built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features basic text formatting options like bold, italic, underline, text color, alignment, and undo/redo.
items.title: SuneraBandara/Text-Editor-1: A lightweight and easy-to-use rich text editor built with HTML, CSS, and JavaScript. Features basic text formatting options like bold, italic, underline, text color, alignment, and undo/redo.

items.content_html: A lightweight workflow orchestration engine built with NestJS
items.title: sinrajat43/OrchaLite: A lightweight workflow orchestration engine built with NestJS

items.content_html: This is my attempt at a technical challenge proposed by Strider company at the Global Career Summit (May 2025) event, to build a lightweight financial transaction application based on Clean Architecture and Domain Driven Design in TypeScript.
items.title: GabrielAlfs/fin-track-backend: This is my attempt at a technical challenge proposed by Strider company at the Global Career Summit (May 2025) event, to build a lightweight financial transaction application based on Clean Architecture and Domain Driven Design in TypeScript.

items.content_html: A lightweight SaaS-style inventory management system built on the MERN stack. It provides user authentication, CRUD operations for items and categories, and a responsive dashboard - all powered by a Vite/React frontend, Express/Node.js backend, and MongoDB data store.
items.title: jessherna/MERN-Inventory-System: A lightweight SaaS-style inventory management system built on the MERN stack. It provides user authentication, CRUD operations for items and categories, and a responsive dashboard - all powered by a Vite/React frontend, Express/Node.js backend, and MongoDB data store.

items.content_html: Quantava is a powerful, expressive ORM for Node.js, built on SQLite. It offers a modern, intuitive API with advanced features like schema validation, soft deletes, and fluent query building — all in a lightweight package.
items.title: AstroXTeam/Quantava: Quantava is a powerful, expressive ORM for Node.js, built on SQLite. It offers a modern, intuitive API with advanced features like schema validation, soft deletes, and fluent query building — all in a lightweight package.

items.content_html: Netlify/Decap CMS alternative. Fast, lightweight, Git-based headless CMS. Modern UX, first-class i18n support, mobile support + 100s of improvements. Open source & free.

items.content_html: # cf-worker-telegramA lightweight Cloudflare Worker that serves as a proxy for the Telegram Bot API. 🌐 This tool helps you navigate network restrictions and streamline your Telegram bot applications. 🛠️## Features- Supports all Telegram Bot API methods- Full CORS support for web applications- High performance with Cloudflare's global networ

items.content_html: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙
items.title: luanreis28aa/hycom-api: HyCom API is a lightweight TypeScript client that simplifies access to the HyCom public API, allowing users to easily fetch authors, posts, and site statistics. 🚀 With its straightforward functions, you can quickly generate QR codes and explore popular tags without hassle. 🐙
